name: AutoBound
description:
Welcome to my submission for the Yogscast Game Jam 2020!

To fit the theme of Surprise, I made an infinite runner/racing game where surprises lie around every corner!

In addition, I've added 2 modifiers from the list: 

  • Brunch Club - Throw bread out of your car window!
  • Nina - Makes everything positively pink!

Feel free to try out each one while you see how far you can get!

Enjoy playing!

Controls: W/S
Drive/ReverseA/DTurnEThrow Bread(With Brunch Club active)

Note: Sometimes the game freezes when generating terrain, so restart if that happens.

Links:
